# I Predicted That Broadcom Would Continue to Soar in the Second Half of 2025. Here's Why the "Ten Titans" Growth Stock Has Room to Run in 2026.

Daniel Foelber, The Motley Fool

Sat, January 31, 2026 at 7:25 PM EST5 min read

[AVGO \\
+0.17%](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/AVGO/ "AVGO")

[NVDA \\
-0.72%](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/NVDA/ "NVDA")

[GOOG \\
-0.04%](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/GOOG/ "GOOG")

[AAPL \\
+0.46%](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/AAPL/ "AAPL")

[META \\
-2.95%](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/META/ "META")

After a red-hot first half of 2025, [I predicted](https://www.fool.com/investing/2025/06/15/prediction-this-red-hot-growth-stock-will-continue/?utm_source=yahoo-host-full&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=article&referring_guid=561d6840-42ed-46de-a685-87befe85725f) that **Broadcom**(NASDAQ: AVGO) would continue to run higher in the second half of last year due to its leading position in global connectivity and [artificial intelligence (AI)](https://www.fool.com/investing/stock-market/market-sectors/information-technology/ai-stocks/?utm_source=yahoo-host-full&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaig
